text:
This does work in the new beta. However, there are <https://HubSpotdev.slack.com/archives/CJ5DN6RKP/p1707162223257419|trade-offs with the current beta>. At the moment you can't include custom modules in the coded template. And you can't saved edited versions of your template like you normally can.

<@U02K6V72MR8>, I would reach out to your development manager if you are a partner or your CSM if not. They may be able to fast track that request for you.
